original_text: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights: Procter & Gamble, Eli Lilly, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Costco Wholesale and Shopify. Company News for Jun 17, 2020. 2 “Strong Buy” Healthcare Stocks with Massive Upside Potential. Emgality® Demonstrates Reduction in Frequency, Duration, and Pain Severity in Patients with Episodic and Chronic Migraine. Lilly Gains as Verzenio Meets Early Breast Cancer Study Goal.
